programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge, (1990, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Cole’s career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Capricorn One, (1977, Thriller)
programme.desc: A NASA Mars mission won't work, and its funding is endangered, so they decide to fake it just this once. But then they have to keep the secret.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: Wicker Man, (1973, Horror)
programme.desc: When a young girl mysteriously disappears, police sergeant Howie travels to a remote Scottish island to investigate. But this pastoral community, led by the strange Lord Summerisle, is not at all what it seems.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy's devious nature fully comes to the surface.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY UP, LUFFY! SHIRAHOSHI'S LIFE IN JEOPARDY!

programme.title: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami's honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIERCE FIGHT BEGINS! LUFFY VS. HORDY!

programme.title: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MASSIVE CONFUSED FIGHT! THE STRAW HATS VS. THE NEW FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he'll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi's big brother risks his own life in a heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY LOSES THE FIGHT?! HORDY'S LONG-AWAITED REVENGE!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SHOCKING FACT! THE TRUE IDENTITY OF HORDY!

programme.title: Hordy's twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-Man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi's brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO ZERO! EARNEST WISHES FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Luffy's fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S ALL-OUT ATTACK! RED HAWK BLASTS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COMING TO AN END! THE FINAL DECISIVE BATTLE AGAINST HORDY!

programme.title: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE FUTURE! THE PATH TO THE SUN!

programme.title: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET REVEALED! THE TRUTH ABOUT THE ANCIENT WEAPON!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy's gang finally gets what's coming to them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS STUNNED! THE NEW FLEET ADMIRAL OF THE NAVY!

programme.title: When Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji stumble upon a couple of Big Mam's henchmen extorting sweets from the peaceful people of Fish-Man Island, the Straw Hats make a new – and very powerful – enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHE LOVES SWEETS! BIG MOM OF THE FOUR EMPERORS!

programme.title: The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MANY PROBLEMS LIE AHEAD! A TRAP AWAITING IN THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FINALLY TIME TO GO! GOODBYE, FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp's extreme deep sea fishing adventure lands the crew in the middle of a deadly whirlpool, but an unexpected encounter with a pod of giant whales may bail the Straw Hats out of hot water!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NEW WORLD! HEADING FOR THE ULTIMATE SEA!

programme.title: Luffy's arrival in the New World is marked by violent weather and the discovery of a tiny stowaway. When the Straw Hats agree to help their new friend, it could lead to big trouble with the Marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! Lily the Little Giant!

programme.title: Nami hatches a plan to save Lily's father, but the arrival of an ex-marine madman throws a monkey wrench into the rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! A Dark and Powerful Army!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro find themselves locked in battle with their latest foes, but Nami's knowledge of the sea may be the key to escaping this scrum alive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! A Great and Desperate Escape Plan!

programme.title: Shuzo's squad of manned torpedoes targets the Straw Hats and the giants! The crazed captain tests Luffy's mettle in a showdown on land, but the wily pirate pulls off a supersized surprise in hopes to stomp out the madman for good
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast that could make short work of Luffy and the gang!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Arriving! A Burning Island – Punk Hazard!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro put their strength to the ultimate test in a battle with a dragon. Meanwhile, a band of mysterious intruders make their gassy presence felt aboard the Sunny!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. the Giant Dragon!

programme.title: Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less Samurai! Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Stunned! Enter: A Samurai’s Horrifying Severed Head!

programme.title: Luffy makes friends with a Centaur, Franky uses a cola-powered laser to break out of the clink, and Sanji takes a chance on a body-less Samurai!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Startling! The Secret of the Island Is Finally Revealed!

programme.title: Nami's soft spot for children prompts her to call off the escape and declare war on anyone who makes a kid cry. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang take a banana boat to the icy side of the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Children! The Straw Hats Start to Fight!

programme.title: Luffy's group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles the torso of a surly samurai, and Captain Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Swordplay Showdown! Brook vs. the Mysterious Torso Samurai!

programme.title: Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for the children, Luffy's group hopes to avoid a perilous plunge into icy waters, and Captain Smoker faces off against Trafalgar Law!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy's group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami's group and cast our heroes into chaotic confusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks into the Ice-Cold Lake!

programme.title: While Luffy and his mates race toward a reunion, Admiral Smoker struggles to survive a heart-stopping showdown with Trafalgar Law!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision! Law vs. Vice Admiral Smoker!

programme.title: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law, but a reunion with his mixed up crew – and the loss of his extra legs – quickly dampens the captain's enthusiasm!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law!

programme.title: While Captain Smoker determines his next move, a very large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard's mysterious transformation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Toriko, Luffy, and Goku's three-way tie in the World's Best Eating Competition, the festivities are interrupted by the sudden appearance of a monster that threatens to consume every living thing on earth.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: History’s Strongest Collaboration vs. Glutton of the Sea

programme.title: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper's Fury! The Master's Inhumane Experiment!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsène Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant…
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: The Legend Of the Lone Ranger, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger of an ambush arranged by the outlaw leader Butch Cavandish returns to fight back as a great masked western hero - The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Astonishing revelations about a top-secret wing of the U.S. military come to light when a reporter encounters an enigmatic Special Forces operator on a mind-boggling mission.

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning, (2009, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Former high school cheerleading captain Rose (Amy Adams) is a thirty-something single mother who cleans houses for a living. Wanting to send her trouble-making son Oscar to a private school, Rose decides to take her married lover's (Steve Zahn) advice.

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer voltar para visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capitão Sharky e sua animada tripulação partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temível, é preciso ser um bom amigo

programme.title: Bons Pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Uma história de amizade e aventura entre Josh, um cão do campo desalinhado, descontraído e amigável, e Cassie, uma cadela mimada da cidade, que não gosta da vida no campo. Eles logo descobrem que não são tão diferente do que imaginavam e, juntos, formam uma grande equipe para proteger seu lar

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma história da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela é filha do Rei.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Minha Vida
programme.desc: Com a ajuda de um anjo da guarda, uma adolescente rica e mimada aprende que o verdadeiro valor está em ajudar os outros.

programme.title: O Cachorro que salvou o Verão
programme.desc: Quando o cão Zeus destrói uma importante festa da família Bannister, ele é enviado para uma escola de treinamento. As crianças Bannister contam com a ajuda de um treinador, que tem seus próprios métodos de treinamento. Será que as novas habilidades de Zeus poderão ajudá-lo a frustrar um trio de ladrões desastrados determinados a fazer deste um verão irritante?

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada
programme.desc: Alex está flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI de luz a salva, aumentando suas habilidades como telecinesia e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - não apenas por roubar um carro da polícia.

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: O Guerreiro
programme.desc: Um guerreiro traído pelo seu exército numa guerra devastadora é dado como morto e resgatado por uma princesa.

programme.title: Estranho, mas verdade
programme.desc: Uma jovem está passando pelo momento de maior complexidade em toda a sua vida: cinco anos após a morte de seu namorado ela misteriosamente ficou grávida dele. Sem nenhuma explicação de como isso ocorreu, decide procurar a família dele com a ideia de que o filho é mesmo do rapaz, mas com isso acabará descobrindo a verdade sobre tudo.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: É Halloween em 1997, e também a última noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vão deixar para trás a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. Mas, para um deles, Corey, alguns assuntos do passado ainda precisam ser resolvidos envolvendo um velho conhecido da infância. Para isso, os dois vão embarcar em uma viagem apavorante através de suas memórias, sonhos e medos.

programme.title: Containment
programme.desc: Vizinhos de um complexo de apartamentos acordam uma manhã e descobrem que estranhos em trajes de proteção os trancaram lá dentro. Incapazes de identificar os infectados dos saudáveis, os que estão em quarentena começam a questionar as autoridades e a atacar uns aos outros numa luta cheia de adrenalina pela sobrevivência.

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7
programme.desc: Um agente aposentado da CIA se une a um agente do FBI para desvendar o mistério do assassinato de um senador.

programme.title: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Nick Hume tinha uma vida comum e feliz até testemunhar o assassinato de seu filho. Quando o culpado do crime consegue ficar em liberdade, Nick, atormentado pela dor, precisa se vingar. Ele, então. decide fazer justiça com as próprias mãos e ir atrás dos responsáveis pela morte do seu filho, se envolvendo em uma rede de gangues criminosas.

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da máfia começa um trabalho tão grande que os torna alvos tanto da máfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: Golpe de Risco
programme.desc: Carregado de muita ação, este filme une os maiores ladrões do mundo na tentativa de executar o roubo do século.

programme.title: O Novato
programme.desc: Quando o erro de um agente novato custa a vida de toda a sua equipe, ele é forçado a fugir e deve descobrir a verdade, recriando os eventos da missão malfadada com apenas a gravação de áudio para guiá-lo.

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado
programme.desc: Um pastor e lutador profissional aceita um cargo em uma igreja em dificuldades, onde ele ajuda a comunidade tanto em sua capacidade oficial quanto como seu alter ego.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7
programme.desc: Um agente aposentado da CIA se une a um agente do FBI para desvendar o mistério do assassinato de um senador.
